sortParamsByRequiredFlag.description: Sort method arguments to place required parameters before optional parameters.

ensureUniqueParams.description: Whether to ensure parameter names are unique in an operation (rename parameters that are not).

allowUnicodeIdentifiers.description: boolean, toggles whether unicode identifiers are allowed in names or not, default is false

responseAs.description: Optionally use libraries to manage response.  Currently PromiseKit, RxSwift are available.

unwrapRequired.description: Treat 'required' properties in response as non-optional (which would crash the app if api returns null as opposed to required option specified in json schema

objcCompatible.description: Add additional properties and methods for Objective-C compatibility (default: false)

podSocialMediaURL.description: Social Media URL used for Podspec

swiftUseApiNamespace.description: Flag to make all the API classes inner-class of {{projectName}}API

hideGenerationTimestamp.description: Hides the generation timestamp when files are generated.

lenientTypeCast.description: Accept and cast values for simple types (string->bool, string->int, int->string)
